article: amid signs that the bush administration is easing its resistance to bailing out crisis-ridden latin american nations , treasury secretary paul h. o'neill on monday assured brazil 's president of washington 's support in its negotiations with the international monetary fund .
abstract: o'neill seeks to reassure brazil of washington 's support
